alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Carlisle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 5:28PM EDT until May 07 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ALEXANDER...CARLISLE...BALLARD AND NORTHEASTERN MISSISSIPPI COUNTIES... At 428 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wickliffe, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cairo, La Center, Bardwell, Wickliffe, Barlow, Wyatt, Lovelaceville, Kevil, Arlington, Wilson City and Blandville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
